name: Cassandra Lee
title: Software Engineer, Google
review: The visual development tools are incredibly intuitive, allowing us to build and deploy applications faster than ever. Our team’s productivity has skyrocketed since we adopted this platform. We’ve been able to focus more on innovation rather than coding from scratch.
